title: WHY I CANT PURCHASE CHAMPIONS TODAY
body: I have got 6300ip but it still shows that i have 6283ip, I cant buy any 6300ip champions so far

replies.body:
Other people are experiencing the same issue. I've started a thread here:
 http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug
